title: Book is a malevolent Void entity and Yuumi is its soulless simulacrum puppet
body:
"Never trust anything that can think for itself if you can't see where it keeps its brain."

Obvious in hindsight, I guess. I'll never look at that champion the same way again.

replies.body: casually ruins the most wholesome champ in the game

> [{quoted}](name=Fliddle,realm=EUW,application-id=6kFXY1kR,discussion-id=5KoHP2wr,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2019-06-17T23:12:14.990+0000)
